ygData.subject: RE: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... C mon Dean, you know you want to worship me ;p ... So there is someone running around killing all those tiny skeletons! I just usually step on them.  I ve
ygData.messageBody:
> Oh god, now we have EQ groupies? That's hilarious. I like Harm at least as
> much as the next guy, but how little life do you have to have to start
> idolizing virtual celebrities?

C'mon Dean, you know you want to worship me ;p

> Hey, what do you mean over and over and over? I have to have something to
> do waiting for that stupid quest gnome in N Karana to spawn... ;-)

So there is someone running around killing all those tiny skeletons!
I just usually step on them. I've seen the Watchman once or twice,
never bothered to do the quest, maybe I should ;-)

Harmonic.
